![](https://www.expertvm.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/expertvm-logo.png "")

We at [ExpertVM](https://www.expertvm.com/ "ExpertVM") is flattered to receive strong responses through our recent participation in the [Happy 56th National Day Singapore Promotion](https://www.lowendtalk.com/discussion/173170/happy-56th-national-day-singapore "Happy 56th National Day Singapore Promotion"). 

Some members here are also quick to realise that we have quietly expanded our offerings and made our VPS prices even cheaper, since our [last offer on LEB about 8 years ago](https://lowendbox.com/blog/expertvm-40year-128mb-openvzkvm-in-singapore/ "last offer on LEB about 8 years ago")

Please allow us to re-introduce ourselves to LET again!

It appears that our AMD Ryzen based VPS is most popular on LET:

**amd1GB**
- 1GB RAM
- 1x vCPU
- 20GB NVMe SSD space
- 750GB Transfer
- 1Gbps Uplink
- 1x IPv4
- KVM/Proxmox
- $4.00/Month or $38.40/Year (equivalent to $3.20/Month) | [**Order Now**](https://billing.expertvm.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=50 "Order Now") 

Of course, there is also an option powered by Dual Intel Xeon hostnode:

**kvm1GB**
- 1GB RAM
- 1x vCPU
- 20GB SSD space
- 750GB Transfer
- 1Gbps Uplink
- 1x IPv4
- KVM/Proxmox
- $4.00/Month or $38.40/Year (equivalent to $3.20/Month) | [**Order Now**](https://billing.expertvm.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=39 "Order Now")

Thanks for all your support!
